howItWorks.title: How MidatoPay works
howItWorks.subtitle: A simple and secure process to protect your sales from inflation

step1.title: Generate QR
step1.description: The merchant creates a QR with the amount in Argentine pesos and the desired cryptocurrency

step2.title: Customer Scans
step2.description: The customer scans the QR with their phone and sees the payment details

step3.title: Payment in ARS
step3.description: The customer pays in Argentine pesos using their preferred method

step4.title: Automatic Conversion
step4.description: MidatoPay automatically converts pesos to cryptocurrencies

cta.title: Ready to protect your sales?
cta.description: Join the merchants who are already protecting their income from inflation.

footer.description: Protect your sales from inflation with cryptocurrency payments. Automatic conversion and blockchain security for your business.

problems.title: Problems
problems.subtitle: We explore merchants' expectations and potential problems to simplify their experience.

problem1.title: Value loss due to inflation
problem1.description: Merchants see how their sales in Argentine pesos lose value day by day due to inflation. They don't understand how to protect their income without changing how they collect.

problem2.title: Unnecessary technical complexity
problem2.description: Customers arrive at the store and cannot understand how to pay with cryptocurrencies. Everything seems complicated, they need wallets, technical knowledge, and end up abandoning the purchase.

waitlist.title: MidatoPay
waitlist.subtitle: The merchants' solution to protect themselves from
waitlist.description: The first merchant wallet that allows charging with interoperable QR and receiving payments directly in cryptocurrencies. Protect your business against inflation while facilitating modern and secure transactions.

news.title: News
news.subtitle: Latest updates and news from MidatoPay

hackathon.title: MidatoPay Wins Hackathon and Advances to Seed Phase at Starknet Startup House
hackathon.excerpt: We are excited to announce that MidatoPay has won 3rd place in a hackathon and has been selected to participate in the Seed Phase of Starknet's Startup House program in Buenos Aires, Argentina.
hackathon.content:
We are happy to share great news! MidatoPay won 3rd place in the Starknet Hackathon among more than 1,400 projects from around the world and has been selected to participate in the Seed Phase of Starknet's Startup House program in Buenos Aires, Argentina.

This recognition fills us with pride and drives us to continue building a real solution for interoperable payments between fiat and crypto for LATAM merchants.

The hackathon victory validates our vision of protecting merchants from inflation through blockchain solutions.

We greatly thank **Cavos**, **Starknet Foundation**, and **Crecimiento Argentina** for the support, trust, and energy that accompanied us throughout the process.

From November 12-16, 2025, our team will participate in the Buenos Aires Startup House, an intensive 5-day program designed to scale projects from MVP to established startups. This program will provide us with:

• Upgraded tech architecture
• A go-to-market plan tailored to our product
• First customer acquisition strategy
• Clear 90-day growth roadmap with follow-up support
• New connections with mentors and Starknet builders

The program includes free accommodation, meals, mentorship, and specialized workshops. We are committed to leveraging this unique opportunity to accelerate the development of our platform and take MidatoPay to the next level.

Stay tuned for more updates as we continue building the future of payments for merchants.

startupHouse.title: MidatoPay to Participate in Starknet Startup House in Buenos Aires
startupHouse.excerpt: Our team is preparing to participate in Starknet's Startup House program in Buenos Aires, an intensive 5-day program designed to scale projects from MVP to established startups.
startupHouse.content:
We are excited to share more details about the Starknet Startup House program we will be participating in from November 12-16, 2025 in Buenos Aires, Argentina.

The Startup House is a program designed for teams building on Starknet who already have a live MVP. The program offers hands-on support from experienced builders and mentors over the course of multiple days to create a successful, user-driven business.

This program is designed to scale your project from MVP to established startup, sharpen your strategies with expert mentors, and create networking opportunities with investors and VCs.

Program benefits:

• Upgraded tech architecture
• A go-to-market plan tailored to your product
• First customer acquisition strategy
• Clear 90-day growth roadmap with follow-up support
• New connections with mentors and Starknet builders

Buenos Aires event information:

• Location: Buenos Aires, Argentina
• Dates: November 12-16, 2025
• Focus: Deep dive into tech refinement & business scaling for your Starknet MVP
• Includes: Free accommodation, meals, mentorship, workshops

We are proud to be part of this program and look forward to sharing our learnings and progress with our community.
